availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hillery M. Bedford (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ann D. Chadwell Bedford. Father of Mary E Bedford, Ryland Bedford, Thomas H. Bedford, William C. Bedford, Ann R. Bedford, and Hillary Bedford. Farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
